message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work something out in the next round.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. I'll give you a small share this time, but I expect a better deal next round.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share than what you offered. Let's split the difference.
You're getting closer to being fair, but I still think I deserve more. This is my last generous offer.
